datum.title: datum
datum.description: Represents a set of data used for machine learning in Jubatus.

items.title: string_values
items.description: Input data represented in string. It is represented as key-value pairs of data. Name of keys cannot contain “$” sign.

items.title: num_values
items.description: Input data represented in numeric value. It is represented as key-value pairs of data.

items.title: binary_values
items.description: Input data represented in binary value. It is represented as key-value pairs of data.

save.title: save
save.description: Store the learing model to the local disk at ALL servers.

return.description: Path to the saved model for each server. The key of the map is in form of ipaddr_portnumber.

load.title: load
load.description: Restore the saved model from local disk at ALL servers.

return.description: True if this function loads files successfully at all servers

clear.title: clear
clear.description: Completely clears the model at ALL servers.

return.description: True when the model was cleared successfully

get_config.title: get_config
get_config.description: Returns server configuration from a server. For format of configuration, see API reference of each services.

get_status.title: get_status
get_status.description: Returns server status from ALL servers. Each server is represented by a pair of IP address and port.

return.description: Internal state for each servers. The key of most outer map is in form of ipaddr_portnumber.

do_mix.title: do_mix
do_mix.description: Force cluster to fire mix. Call this RPC to Jubatus server directly. When you call this to proxy, RPC error will be raised.

get_proxy_status.title: get_proxy_status
get_proxy_status.description: Returns proxy status. This is an RPC method for proxy. When you use this for server, RPC error will be raised.

return.description: Internal state for proxy. The key of most outer map is in form of ipaddr_portnumber.
